import { Col, Container, Row } from "react-bootstrap" import classes from './categories.module.css' import { useState } from "react" const Categories = () => { const [isResidentalStructureBtn, setIsResidentalStructureBtn] = useState(false) const onResidentalStructureBtn = () => { setIsResidentalStructureBtn((prevState) => !prevState) } return ( { isResidentalStructureBtn ?
Residential Structures
: null}
Public Structures
Urban Development Projects
Production Buildings
Reconstruction
Small Architectural Forms
) } export default Categories
